title: Remove endorsement from frontend
description: Delete src/frontend/src/components/features/endorsement-card.tsx entirely. Then edit src/frontend/src/lib/graphql/types.ts to remove the Endorsement interface and the endorsements field from the Builder interface. Then edit src/frontend/src/lib/graphql/queries/builders.ts to remove the endorsements { ... } fragment from the GraphQL query. Then edit src/frontend/src/app/profile/[username]/page.tsx to remove the EndorsementCard import and the entire endorsements section from the JSX. Finally edit src/frontend/src/app/profile/[username]/page.test.tsx to remove endorsements: [] from mock data.
acceptance_criteria:
- src/frontend/src/components/features/endorsement-card.tsx does not exist
- No reference to endorsement in types.ts, builders.ts, page.tsx, or page.test.tsx
- cd src/frontend && npx tsc --noEmit succeeds
